Title: Memory
Writer: Dario Scardapane, Jef Geeraerts, Carl Joos
Actors: Monica Bellucci, Liam Neeson, Guy Pearce
Plot: An assassin-for-hire finds that he's become a target after he refuses to complete a job for a dangerous criminal organization. A remake of the 2003 Belgian film 'The Memory of a Killer'.
